attributes.action: No to A Darling's No Promotional Tour of America
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to reconsider  the promotional tour for a No vote by Alistair Darling to America. In this austerity period it is a total waste of tax payers money, and will serve no purpose as America has no say in the voting for the Referendum.

rejection.details: This is a partyn political matter and not for Government
